summary: REQ-28 aims to increase only the hero logo size by changing only that element’s Tailwind sizing classes in frontend/src/App.tsx, without any other changes. The diff summary indicates the logo size was increased, but also shows additional, unrelated file modifications that violate the “only that changes” constraint/AC.

missing_requirements.requirement: Only the hero logo element at the specified XPath is changed; no other elements’ code/styling is modified (update only that element’s Tailwind sizing classes in frontend/src/App.tsx).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff indicates additional files besides frontend/src/App.tsx were modified, which conflicts with the requirement/AC that only the targeted change be made.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to global styling/theme utilities (e.g., OKLCH color system changes, new section-alt token, bg-texture utility).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly restricts changes to only increasing the hero logo size via its Tailwind sizing classes.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind configuration changes (extended neutral palette, custom typography, refined spacing).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and would affect styling beyond the selected hero logo element.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of a new background texture SVG asset for subtle patterned background.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; would be a new visual/styling element beyond increasing the hero logo size.

hallucinated_features.description: Repository metadata/state update unrelated to changing the hero logo sizing classes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-28; requirement calls for updating only the element’s Tailwind sizing classes in frontend/src/App.tsx.
